doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Abul Kalam Azad
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), MACP, FRCP (Edinburgh & Glasgow)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Abul Kalam Azad is a Gastroenterologist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), MACP, FRCP (Edinburgh & Glasgow). He is a Former Professor & Head, Gastroenterology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Abul Kalam Azad at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal is 10am to 2pm & 5pm to 10pm (Video Call).

doctor.name: Dr. Subrata Paul
doctor.specialty: Double FCPS Medicine, Gastroliver & Diabetes Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Subrata Paul, MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), FCPS (Gastroenterology), MACP (USA), is a highly qualified specialist in medicine, gastroenterology, liver diseases, and diabetes. With a double FCPS in Medicine and Gastroenterology, he provides expert treatment for conditions such as hepatitis, fatty liver, liver cirrhosis, GERD, peptic ulcer, IBS, and diabetes-related complications. He serves as an Assistant Registrar at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Subrata Paul is available for consultation at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal (K Jahan Center, House # 106, Sadar Road) from 5 PM to 9 PM every day.
